Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I'm back! Due to the recent server troubles, and since I was banned in Feb(Private reasons), I have gotten my Nicolas411 account back! Now, Mods, please don't ban me, I've set a goal to start over on this. Anyways, I'm sorry for previous trouble with this account, I'll handle it better now!

~Nicolas411

Welcome back Nicolas411, you be good this time you hear?

Have fun, fly safe, and stay out of trouble

Yes, I will. So glad to be back on this. I have a confession. The accounts Trollar, supermario2902 and DaveK were all mine. All alternate accounts. I didn't like not having an account on this great forum. I won't do any of this again, I swear.
Indeed, we knew. Just stay on the fun side this time and all will be good. Welcome Back.
Oh yeah. I kept sending EMAILS about having you lift my ban, but you guys never responded. Again, I'm VERY sorry.
